nodes.title: Mission ISRO podcast by Harsha Bhogle
nodes.excerpt: Listen to wonderful journey of ISRO narrated by voice of Cricket, Harsha Bhogle..

nodes.title: Long Bike trip preparation
nodes.excerpt: Getting ready for a long motorcycle trip is not easy. Especially if you are going to be on the road for a very long time. Here are some of the things I did before I started my journey, which was paused after 4 months on the road.

nodes.title: A step towards life on the road
nodes.excerpt: On November 1st week of 2019, I decided to embark on a new journey, one aimed towards not escaping the hectic urban life but to jump out ofâ€¦
